class.name: AudioSpatializerEffect
class.description: An [AudioSpatializer] that can take a list of [AudioEffect]s, which are used to process the [AudioStream] when it is being mixed. Needs to be extended, to return a valid [AudioSpatializerInstanceEffect] implementation.

method.name: _instantiate_effect
method.description: Used to instantiate an [AudioSpatializerInstanceEffect] implementation. Used in place of the [method AudioSpatializer._instantiate].

members.member: Array of [AudioEffect]s that are used to process the audio stream during mixing. This array is copied and appended to [member AudioSpatializerInstanceEffect.audio_effects] after [method _instantiate_effect] is used to create them.
